intro.description: In this step you will add ports to your MARTE/GCM components

item.title: Add ports
item.description: Use the model explorer to create a new composite diagram within the "components" package Use the standard MARTE mechanism to add ports, i.e. client/server or flow ports - the associated FCM stereotypes will be set automatically.
